subject: Public Speaking
title: Emma Watson's HeForShe Campaign
description: Learn Emma Watson's HeForShe Campaign in one minute.

hook.text: In 2014, Emma Watson addressed the UN to launch a gender equality campaign. She invited men to join the fight.

buildup.text: Watson argued that feminism had become an uncomfortable word and that gender equality benefits everyone.

discovery.text: Her key move: she made it personal. She talked about her own experiences of being sexualized as a teenager.

twist.text: She received death threats within days. Speaking about equality proved her point about how dangerous it still was.

climax.text: The HeForShe campaign enrolled hundreds of thousands. Celebrity and personal truth amplified each other.

punchline.text: She asked men to care. Millions said yes.

quiz.question: What was the key strategy of Watson's HeForShe speech?
options: Inviting men to join the fight for gender equality
